alert.note: Alert for Allen (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 10:16PM CDT until July 12 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Allen County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1016 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kincaid, or 13 miles west of Mound City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mildred. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
